Uses of Class
osyfe.graphic.Shader

  • Packages that use Shader 
    Package Description
    osyfe.graphic
    Manages graphical OpenGL objects.
    osyfe.graphic.util
    Contains graphics utilities such as cameras, text rendering and basic shape generation.

    • Uses of Shader in osyfe.graphic

      Methods in osyfe.graphic with parameters of type Shader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Rendable.render(Shader shader)
      Renders this rendable with the given shader after setting all assigned uniforms.
      void Model.render(Shader shader)
      Renders this model using the given shader.
      void Mesh.render(Shader shader)
      Render the current active geometry using the given shader (which has to be bound!).
      void Model.setupUniforms(Shader shader)
      Loads the Shader.BONES_TRAFO uniforms accordings to the last set animation state into the given shader.

    • Uses of Shader in osyfe.graphic.util

      Methods in osyfe.graphic.util with parameters of type Shader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Font.setupUniforms(Shader shader)
      default: lock = false.
      void Camera.setupUniforms(Shader shader)
      Sets the uniforms Shader.VIEW and Shader.PROJECTION in the given shader.
      void Font.setupUniforms(Shader shader, boolean lock)
      Sets the sampler uniforms Shader.GLYPH_ATLAS + (0, 1, ...) in the given shader.
